jcr:content.jcr:title: CONTINUOUS TOMATO PREPARATIONS LINE
jcr:content.title: CONTINUOUS TOMATO PREPARATIONS LINE
jcr:content.vanityDescription: This line handles production of smooth to small particulate tomato sauces and pastes. It allows you to produce a broad range of tomato preparations – natural products with more tomato content, less sugar, and fewer additives – that taste natural and homemade. The recipe-specific shear rate in mixing and optimized heat-treatment achieves the desired product characteristics. Our line enables safe production with exceptional quality and efficiency.
